HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Balíkovna na adresu: 70,- s DPH. DPD Classic: 77,- s DPH. GLS: 97,- s DPH.
HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Free shipping on orders over 2,000 CZK without VAT for retail customers, with a selected carrier.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Processing time is 1-2 business days. Delivery time is not specified.
HOME_DELIVERY.cod_surcharge: Balíkovna na adresu: 36,- s DPH, DPD Classic: 30,- s DPH, GLS: 30,- s DPH

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Zásilkovna: 53,- s DPH. Balíkovna: 52,- s DPH. GLS Parcel Shop: 30,- s DPH.
PARCEL_SHOPS.free_delivery_limit: Free shipping on orders over 2,000 CZK without VAT for retail customers, with a selected carrier.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: 20,- s DPH for online payment. 40,- s DPH for payment upon receipt (cash or card). Minimum order value is 50,- CZK with VAT.
IN_STORE_PICKUP.cod_surcharge: 20,- s DPH (for payment in cash or by card upon receipt at the store)

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: Stoklasa.cz offers home delivery, parcel shop delivery, and in-store pickup in the Czech Republic. Home delivery is handled by Balíkovna na adresu, DPD, and GLS. Parcel shop options include Zásilkovna, Balíkovna, and GLS Parcel Shop. In-store pickup is available at their own stores, partner stores, and the main warehouse. PRICING: Parcel shop delivery is the cheapest, starting at 30 CZK for GLS Parcel Shop. Home delivery starts at 70 CZK. In-store pickup costs 20-40 CZK depending on the payment method. Free shipping is available for retail customers on orders over 2,000 CZK (excl. VAT) via a selected carrier. COD is available for most services with surcharges ranging from 30 to 42 CZK. NOTABLE FEATURES: Extensive network of physical pickup locations, including their own stores and partner locations. Clear and detailed pricing tables for each delivery and payment combination. A minimum order value of 50 CZK applies to in-store pickups. Zásilkovna cannot be used for oversized items. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is comprehensive, transparent, and well-organized. The breakdown of costs by carrier and payment method is excellent. The only significant missing detail is the specific estimated delivery timeframe for each carrier, beyond the general 1-2 day processing time.
